_sText:
Mouse Controlled
====================



Security Camera is following your mouse
-----------------------------------------------



- Player(using the camera) cannot be killed by other Players 

Multiplayer point_viewcontrol bug: 
--------------------

If a player uses a point_viewcontrol and dies before un-using it (to leave it) they will be stuck viewing it until they un-use it manually. This Server Plugin (Made by MasterOfTheXP)") makes them leave the viewcontrol automatically when they die or respawn.

Video: 


Please give some Feedback =)
